messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
For the sake of my collection, I
take on people I know I can’t beat. That’s what a Collector does.
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
That attack right then was remarkable!
You ought to be proud of it!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I take pride in having Pokémon that
others don’t.Oh, I’m also proud about winning second
prize in one of Jubilife TV’s drawings.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
For the sake of my collection, I
keep battling people I can’t beat.That’s what a Collector does.
